welcome_message_body: Welcome to Palermo, where history and culture meet in a vibrant blend of ancient ruins, beautiful architecture, and mouthwatering cuisine. Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this city and discover everything it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Biga Genio e Farina
restaurants.description: Biga Genio e Farina is a pizzeria located in Palermo.

restaurants.name: Ke Palle
restaurants.description: Ke Palle is a italian restaurant located in Palermo.

restaurants.description: Enotequa is a gastropub located in Palermo.

restaurants.description: Caffe del Kàssaro is a mediterranean restaurant located in Palermo.

restaurants.name: Moltivolti
restaurants.description: Moltivolti is a comfort food restaurant located in Palermo.
restaurants.address: Via Mario Puglia 21 (Via Saladino), 90134 Palermo Sicilia

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Punta Raisi Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Punta Raisi Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
